solution_line_template: First find the total number of starfish arms: {num_starfish} starfish * {arms_per_starfish} arms/starfish = <<{num_starfish}*{arms_per_starfish}={total_starfish_arms}>>{total_starfish_arms} arms
Then add the number of seastar arms to find the total number of arms: {total_starfish_arms} arms + {seastar_arms} arms = <<{total_starfish_arms}+{seastar_arms}={total_arms}>>{total_arms} arms
